狂屈曰：¶
「唉！¶
予知之，¶
將語若。」¶
中欲言

黃帝曰：¶
「彼无為謂真是也，¶	KR5c0126_022:1a:34:1:6
狂屈似之；¶	KR2c0021_005:43b:7:13:1,KR4d0088_008:17a:9:6:18,KR5c0051_007:42a:1:16:1,KR5c0095_013:025b:3:3:31,KR5c0105_001:002b:7:11:2,KR5c0106_015:011a:2:3:4,KR5c0114_039:002b:2:2:9,KR5c0126_022:1a:35:1:6,KR5c0127_064:001b:4:16:2,KR5c0127_098:002a:5:16:2,KR5c0128_023:001b:5:4:2,KR5c0128_023:002a:3:14:2,KR5c0135_021:001b:7:8:4,KR5c0136_011:013a:1:16:15,KR5c0138_007:29a:6:16:4,KR5c0139_024:002b:10:14:5,KR5h0057_005:042a:8:17:47,KR5i0036_004:04p042b:5:15:9,KR6m0045_002:0296b:19:12:11

其易也，其唯大人乎！¶	KR2c0021_005:44a:5:4:1,KR5c0051_007:42b:6:15:1,KR5c0067_002:022b:8:3:39,KR5c0126_022:1a:59:1:8,KR5c0127_064:002a:1:14:2,KR5c0128_023:002b:1:7:2,KR5c0135_021:002a:4:6:4,KR5c0136_011:013a:8:14:15,KR5c0138_007:29b:6:3:4,KR5h0057_005:042b:5:15:48

# src: ZHUANG 22.1.10 Guo Qingfan 733; Wang Shumin 809; Fang Yong 586; Chen Guying 558
# dating: 8110
生也死之徒，¶	KR2c0021_005:44a:5:12:1,KR5c0051_007:42b:7:30:1,KR5c0123_015:018a:10:3:9,KR5c0126_022:1a:60:1:9,KR5c0136_011:013a:9:5:15,KR5c0138_007:29b:7:5:4,KR5c0139_024:005a:3:1:7,KR5h0057_005:042b:6:6:48,KR5i0036_004:04p043a:4:5:10

黃帝曰：¶
「彼其真是也，¶	KR5c0126_022:1a:88:1:13,KR5c0138_007:30a:8:5:4

曰：¶

# dating: 8110

「今日晏閒，¶	KR2c0021_083:36a:4:6:1,KR4h0145_038:33a:3:21:100,KR4h0145_041:9b:1:21:33,KR5c0126_022:5a:46:1:25,KR5c0135_021:004a:9:8:6

# dating: 8110
「且夫『博之不必知，¶	KR2c0021_083:36b:3:10:1,KR5c0051_007:47a:3:31:1,KR5c0126_022:5a:78:1:30,KR5c0127_065:007a:3:5:25,KR5c0128_023:010a:7:1:2,KR5c0136_011:017b:8:6:20,KR5c0138_007:32b:7:20:4,KR5c0139_024:016b:1:1:19,KR5i0036_004:04p045b:8:6:10

奚足以為堯桀之是非！¶	KR2c0021_083:37a:1:13:1,KR5c0126_022:5a:101:1:33,KR5c0138_007:33b:1:1:4

# dating: 8110

知之外矣。」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_022-15a>¶	KR5c0047_003:020a:1:9:17,KR5c0051_007:53b:5:3:1,KR5c0063_004:016b:5:1:13,KR5c0064_010:002b:7:4:3,KR5c0079_013:016b:10:5:6,KR5c0079_013:017b:4:14:6,KR5c0100_009:024b:9:13:8,KR5c0100_009:025b:7:5:8,KR5c0103_009:018a:9:8:1,KR5c0106_018:009b:7:5:6,KR5c0113_001:035a:3:6:3,KR5c0114_039:002b:10:6:9,KR5c0123_020:006a:10:13:2,KR5c0126_022:10a:140:1:65,KR5c0127_066:008b:3:14:24,KR5c0128_023:019a:3:1:2,KR5c0135_021:010b:3:1:13,KR5c0136_011:021a:7:16:23,KR5c0136_011:021b:9:10:24,KR5c0138_007:36b:6:7:4,KR5c0139_024:032a:7:16:34,KR5h0057_005:052b:6:17:58,KR5i0036_004:04p049a:6:7:10,KR5i0036_004:04p055b:10:12:10

「已矣，¶
未應矣！¶

无已。¶
聖人之愛人也終无已者，¶	KR5c0126_022:10a:241:1:80,KR5c0127_067:005a:7:6:23
亦乃取於是者也。」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_022-20a>¶	KR2c0021_095:119b:6:3:3,KR5c0051_007:56b:2:15:1,KR5c0126_022:10a:242:1:80,KR5c0127_067:005a:7:16:23,KR5c0128_023:022a:4:11:2,KR5c0136_011:024b:10:16:27,KR5c0138_007:38b:8:26:4,KR5c0139_024:040a:3:11:42,KR5h0057_005:055a:7:16:60,KR5i0036_004:04p051a:5:5:10,KR6q0219_003:0045c:20:8:68

# src: ZHUANG 22.12.1 Guo Qingfan 765; Wang Shumin i47; Fang Yong 615; Chen Guying 588
# dating: 8110
顏淵問乎仲尼曰：¶	KR5c0126_022:10a:243:1:81,KR5i0036_004:04p051a:6:32:10
「回嘗聞諸夫子曰：¶	KR5c0051_007:56b:3:23:1,KR5c0126_022:10a:244:1:81,KR5c0127_067:011a:1:8:56,KR5c0128_023:023b:3:8:2,KR5c0135_021:012b:8:8:15,KR5c0136_011:025a:8:8:27,KR5c0139_024:040a:9:8:42,KR5h0057_005:056a:6:8:61,KR5i0036_004:04p051a:7:1:10
『无有所將，¶	KR5c0126_022:10a:245:1:81,KR5c0127_067:011a:1:15:56
无有所迎。』¶	KR5c0126_022:10a:246:1:81,KR5c0127_067:011a:2:2:56
回敢問其遊。」¶	KR5c0051_007:56b:4:15:1,KR5c0126_022:10a:247:1:81,KR5c0127_067:011a:2:6:56,KR5c0128_023:023b:4:6:2,KR5c0135_021:012b:9:6:15,KR5c0136_011:025a:9:6:27,KR5c0139_024:040a:10:6:42,KR5h0057_005:056a:7:6:61,KR5i0036_004:04p051a:7:16:10

仲尼曰：¶
「古之人，¶

若儒墨者師，¶	KR2c0021_095:20b:7:21:1,KR5c0126_022:10a:263:1:83,KR5c0127_067:011a:6:10:56,KR5c0127_067:012b:8:14:56,KR5c0128_023:023b:8:10:2,KR5c0135_021:013a:3:12:15,KR5c0136_011:025b:3:10:28,KR5c0138_007:39a:7:24:4,KR5c0139_024:042a:6:5:44,KR5h0057_005:056b:1:10:62
故以是非相𩐋也，	KR5c0126_022:10a:264:1:83
而況今之人乎！¶	KR2c0021_095:20b:8:12:1,KR5c0126_022:10a:264:8:83,KR5c0127_067:011a:7:5:56,KR5c0135_021:013a:4:7:15,KR5c0136_011:025b:4:5:28,KR5c0139_024:042a:6:17:44

# src: ZHUANG 22.12.4 Guo Qingfan 765; Wang Shumin i47; Fang Yong 615; Chen Guying 588
# dating: 8110
聖人處物不傷物。¶	KR2b0017_074:16a:5:22:1,KR2c0021_095:20b:8:18:1,KR3k0025_046:8a:3:12:8,KR4h0002_043:4b:2:14:4,KR4h0003_042:4a:9:16:41,KR5c0092_002:019b:9:12:31,KR5c0123_005:008a:8:9:1,KR5c0126_022:10a:265:1:84,KR5c0127_067:011a:7:11:56,KR5c0127_067:012b:10:10:56,KR5c0127_067:014a:4:4:56,KR5c0128_023:023b:9:11:2,KR5c0135_021:013a:4:13:15,KR5c0136_011:025b:4:11:28,KR5c0138_007:39b:1:18:4,KR5c0139_024:042b:4:1:45,KR5h0057_005:056b:2:12:62,KR5i0036_004:04p051b:6:31:10

夫知遇
而不知所不遇，¶	KR2c0021_095:21a:4:11:1,KR5c0126_022:10a:279:4:86,KR5c0127_067:011b:2:3:56,KR5c0127_067:013a:6:16:56,KR5c0128_023:025a:6:15:2,KR5c0135_021:013b:8:15:16,KR5c0136_011:025b:9:3:28,KR5c0138_007:39b:7:7:4,KR5c0139_024:044a:3:4:46,KR5h0057_005:056b:7:4:62,KR5i0036_004:04p052a:3:34:10
